mutator.name: Argument Propagation Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: A return value has been replaced by a method argument

mutator.name: Conditionals Boundary Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: A relational operator has been replaced by a boundary counterpart

mutator.name: Constructor Call Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: A constructor call has been removed

mutator.name: Increments Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: A local variable increment/decrement has been replaced

mutator.name: Inline Constant Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: An inline constant has been changed

mutator.name: Invert Negs Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: A number has been replaced by its opposite

mutator.name: Math Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: A binary arithmetic operation has been replaced by another one

mutator.name: Negate Conditionals Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: A conditional expression has been negated

mutator.name: Non Void Method Call Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: A method call has been removed

mutator.name: Return Vals Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: The return value of a method call has been replaced

mutator.name: Void Method Call Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: A method call has been removed

mutator.name: Member Variable Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: A member variable assignment has been replaced

mutator.name: Remove Increments Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: An increment operation has been removed.

mutator.name: Remove Switch Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: A switch statement has been replaced with the default label.

mutator.name: Return Values Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: A return value has been replaced.

mutator.name: Switch Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: The default label has been replaced.
